main event: On 6 November 1957, a round object with a tail was observed drifting slowly downwards in Kennesaw, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a basketball and glowed with a yellow or orange color before gradually turning red., The observation lasted between 2 to 3 minutes., The object was described as having a tail that was five to six times its size., It was suggested that the sighting could be a meteor due to characteristics resembling one., The object seemed to have a forced fall, disappearing behind trees.
sighted object: A round object with a tail
witness description: Mechanic who provided observations from the ground
